channel.title: Licensing on Jarvist Moore Frost
channel.description: Recent content in Licensing on Jarvist Moore Frost

item.title: MIT Licensing
item.description: Open-source software licenses are intensely boring things to read about. The choice available makes it very easy to default to not organising a license. Particularly when you are a serial procrastinator like me! However I would love for others to use my codes. It’s why I wrote them. So I sat down for a concerted half hour reading. My personal bias having benefited so much from GNU software would be for the GPL.
